name: Backpacker's Pantry Organic Apple Cinnamon Oats and Quinoa
categories: Organic Apple Cinnamon Oats and Quinoa
description:
Enjoy a delicious backcountry breakfast. Just add water, and wait 5 minutes. Rehydration times increase with elevation, roughly double for every 1800m of gain.Ingredients: organic instantized rolled oats, organic nonfat milk, organic quinoa, organic apples, organic evaporated cane juice, organic cinnamon, sea salt.
